name: Polish Spirits Industry
membership:
-spiritsEurope http://spirits.eu/
-The National Chamber of Commerce http://www.kig.pl/
goal:
We focus on the following areas of operation:
-fostering conditions that are conducive to the evelopment of the spirits industry, both domestically and abroad,
-working together with public authorities, the academia, and NGOs,
-ensuring recognition of and respect for traditional manufacturing methods,
-promoting responsible consumption of legal alcohol.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Internal Market, Public Health, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Health and tax policy and the social responsibility and external trade and food science
